column4: hi. i installed ubuntu on my 2nd hdd, how do i access files on my first hdd? I don't see it anywhere using file browser. thanks
blissex, i don't quite get it. i'm very new to ubuntu.. just installed..

you use a graphical filebrowser with green/brownish maps right?
